New Records: Australia became the first nation to concede more than 200 in four consecutive T20 internationals
Key Match Events: Tim David hit a four on the final ball of the innings to deliver Australia a thrilling win over New Zealand
Mitch Marsh scored 72 off 44 to steer Australia within reach of the total
Rachin Ravindra lashed six sixes in his 68 off 35 balls
Pre-Game Insights: Doubts linger over whether Steve Smith will go to his fourth T20 World Cup
Post-Match Reflections: Mitch Marsh was proud of Tim David's performance and said it takes complete trust in your game and a real confidence to go out there and do that
Miscellaneous Highlights: New Zealand's total of 215 was the Black Caps' highest T20 score against Australia
Australia's win was their third-best T20 chase
